results.content: I've been looking for a long time for a course with up to date, detailed technology and the kind of content which would help me get equipped for a job instead of merely teaching me the technology itself. Gotta thank the instructor. The accent was something I was not used to, but I was still hooked to the very first video itself. Thank you Ebenezer~!
